channel.title: Posts on Ulysse Jobard incredible Blog

item.title: Creation of this blog
item.description: As proposed, I used hugo for creating this site. I juste sad some small issues at the beginning because of a bad config file, but once this was right, it seems really straightforward and easy to use. Really easier to code all by yourself, fortunately!
